dcterms:creator: Yelp
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 25,071 restaurants, 1,363,242 reviews of these restaurants, and 98,786 images. Many of the images do not have labels or captions, which are the primary links to connect reviews with images because the dataset does not provide an existing mapping between them.
dcterms:title: Yelp Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Chollet
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 is a dataset used for image classification tasks, consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database designed for visual recognition research, containing millions of images categorized into thousands of classes.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a dataset designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing over 300,000 images with annotations for object instances and captions.
dcterms:title: Microsoft COCO
